title: Arnold Schwarzenegger shares snap with his 'hero' Jackie Chan as longtime friends reunite
text:
They recently worked together on the action fantasy flick Journey To China: The Mystery Of Iron Mask.

So Arnold Schwarzenegger, 72, and Jackie Chan, 65, were delighted when they bumped into one another on Saturday.

The powerful duo took to Instagram to share snaps from the run-in, with both men boasting about each other in gushing captions.

Happy meet up: Arnold Schwarzenegger, 72, and Jackie Chan, 65, were delighted when they bumped into one another on Saturday

Arnie wrote: 'It was fantastic to run into my old friend and a hero of mine @jackiechan when I got back from the #terminatordarkfate world tour. A legend and an inspiration.'

Jackie captioned his: 'So happy to run into my good old friend and legend @schwarzenegger.'

Both were casually dressed with the former Mr. Universe in a blue T-shirt with his shades tucked down the front, while Jackie wore a grey hoodie.

Action adventure: Arnie, 72, and Jackie, 65, recently worked together on the fantasy flick Journey To China: The Mystery Of Iron Mask; It's released in China but has yet to set a US date

The martial arts expert was in town to pick up BAFTA LA's Albert R. Broccoli Britannia Award for Worldwide Contribution To Entertainment on Friday at the Beverly Hilton in Beverly Hills.

Meanwhile, the Kindergarten Cop star returned from his world tour promoting Terminator: Dark Fate, the sixth film in the franchise that kicked off in October 1984.

However, it will serve as a direct sequel to The Terminator and 1991's Terminator 2: Judgement Day, ignoring all the other movies in the highly successful series.

He's a winner: The martial arts expert was in town to pick up BAFTA LA's Britannia Award for Worldwide Contribution To Entertainment on Friday at the Beverly Hilton in Beverly Hills

Animal lover: Jackie couldn't resist bringing his plush pandas along with him

This is to bring Linda Hamilton back into the story. Her character, Sarah Connor, was killed off in the third movie, 2009 Terminator Salvation. and only her voice was heard.

They will wrap their world tour with the movie’s red carpet premier in Los Angeles on Monday. Terminator: Dark Fate is due to debut on Nov. 1.

Meanwhile, Arnie and Jackie's movie Journey To China: The Mystery Of Iron Mask was released in China on August 19, but it has yet to set a release date for the US.
